solution_line_template: Billy has {suggestions_per_list} suggestions generate for him {num_attempts} times for {suggestions_per_list}*{num_attempts}=<<{suggestions_per_list}*{num_attempts}={total_videos_generated}>>{total_videos_generated} videos.

There are {suggestions_per_list}-{picked_show_rank} = <<{suggestions_per_list}-{picked_show_rank}={shows_not_considered}>>{shows_not_considered} shows in the final set of suggestions he doesn't consider
This means he picks the {total_videos_generated} - {shows_not_considered} = <<{total_videos_generated}-{shows_not_considered}={final_show_number}>>{final_show_number}th show YouTube suggests
